summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Ravenna Avenue, from East 51st Street to East 45th Street; by the constructing of watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8336 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of Payment by Bonds.
